name: Conhead - Don't Enter Weird Space Portals
name_original: Conhead - Don't Enter Weird Space Portals
description:
Welcome to Conhead - Don't Enter Weird Space Portals!

DISCLAIMER: This game is not associated with Cuphead or MDHR Studios in any way, shape, or form. This is merely a fangame, and was not made for money or anything of the sorts. Most SFX is from Cuphead, while the music is completely original.

NOTE: This is a prototype of the battle system. This is nowhere close to the full game, and won't be considered the official demo.

-STORY-

Context, some weird lil' guy, was taking a stroll through the woods late at night for some reason. He came across some sort of portal thing hidden behind a tree and accidentally tripped on a raccoon, falling in and appearing in some sort of Space Casino thing.

"Ah, a newcomer!" a voice behind him said. Context turned around to find himself face-to-face with some sort of green 3-eyed generic alien dude. "It seems you haven't payed for entry," the alien stated. "And what might that be?" Conhead said, feeling cocky. "Why, your soul, of course!" the alien exclaimed. "Okay sure but let me just tell my mom to feed my cat real quick," Conhead said, unfazed.

"Ah, a spunky one, eh? I could use a little of that here," the alien said. "How about this? You go get me some other souls to munch for a midnight snack and I'll let you live!"

"Uh okay sounds good" Context said, starting the literally stupidest adventure he's ever gone on.

-GAMEPLAY CONTROLS-

Arrow keys - Move

Z - Jump

Z (while in air) - Parry

X - Shoot

C - Dash
